text: This is the best product I have ever used, my life is changed forever! Five stars, highly recommend to everyone.
Worst purchase ever. Broke after a single day and the customer service was terrible. Do not buy this garbage.

I've been using this for about three weeks now. The setup was pretty easy, and the battery life is decent, lasting me a full workday. However, the software can be a little bit buggy sometimes, which is frustrating. Overall, a solid 4-star product for the price.
It's an okay product. Does what it says on the tin, but nothing more. The build quality feels a bit cheap, and I'm not sure it will last very long. I probably wouldn't buy it again.
AMAZING! INCREDIBLE! A MUST-HAVE FOR EVERYONE. BUY IT NOW YOU WONT REGRET IT!!!!!
The delivery was late, but the product itself is good. I used it to bake a cake and it came out perfectly. The instruction manual could be clearer, but I figured it out.
Don't listen to the haters, this thing is a masterpiece of engineering. Flawless in every way. The negative reviews are clearly from competitors.
I was really excited to get this, but it didn't live up to the hype. The main feature works, but it's much slower than advertised. I'm considering returning it. It's not bad, just disappointing.
